title: Installing a small cluster with Hashicorp control plane
content: I went ahead and installed with npm and nomad, Consul, postgres, and all the rest

title: Maintaining a small cluster with Hashicorp control plane
content: I'm going to talk about maintaining a small dev cluster. We'll create it on digital ocean using their smallest instance type. We need to pay attention to CPU usage, disk type, start/stop/restart procedures. How can we replace a Nomad, deployment/job? We need to stop it, prepare a new, and deploy. How do we define a job? With HCL, like everything else, but with a little new syntax.

title: Troubleshooting a Hashcorp cluster
content: Have you checked the ports yet? Have you checked the components of the control plane. Nomad, Consul, Traefik, and so on. How many other things have you checked? Has the system run out of ephemeral ports? Where are the connections coming from/going to?.

title: Improvements for the Hashicorp cluster
content: We will schedule an increase in pod 3. Increase ports on all members of cluster 10. What other TODOs could be done sooner than later?
